prompts: Create a legendary Pokemon that resembles a molten creature with a fiery core and rocky exterior.
Design an imposing fire and steel-type Pokemon with a rugged, metallic body and glowing orange accents.
Imagine a mythical Pokemon that embodies the power of lava and metal, with a fierce expression and sturdy limbs.
Generate a unique Pokemon with a combination of fire and steel elements, showcasing a tough, armored appearance.
Show me a creature that blends the essence of fire and rock, with intense colors and formidable claws.
Make a powerful Pokemon that looks like a walking volcano, combining molten lava and rocky textures.
Give me a Pokemon with a molten theme, featuring a mix of orange and gray colors, and a robust build.

distinctive_features: Distinctive head shape with a fierce look
